title.narrative: Promoting Coordination, Coherence, Integration and Knowledge Management under Energy Component of SPWA

description.narrative: The specific objective of this project is to improve the coordination and coherence of the SPWA’s (Strategic Program for West Africa) Energy Component, as well as to contribute to the sustainable development in West Africa through the promotion of reliable and affordable renewable energy and energy efficiency technologies and services.
